Description: Used in Half-Life to create auto-save. Unusable in Sven Co-op.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Name of the [multisource](../multisource) entity that (temporary) locks this {{ entname }}. If master is specified the {{ entname }} will be disabled and it will not save the game. When [multisource](../multisource) entity is triggered/being triggering by all possible inputs, the {{ entname }} will be unlocked. When [multisource](../multisource) lost at least one input signal, the entities becomes locked again.
